resources.string: Slide-to-unlock days occur once per week to collect your baseline unlock speed.
You\'re all set! Twitch will appear when you turn the screen off and back on. We recommend removing existing locks from your unlock screen to avoid a double unlock.
Please enter your email address. It is for contact purposes only, and will not be connected to your data.
Set Twitch as your default home launcher by pressing the button below, selecting Twitch, and pressing \'Always.\'
If the button is unresponsive, Twitch is already your home launcher and you may skip this step.

This microtask asks you to validate the output of a computer program that splits sentences into factual relationships. Here are a few sample extractions, starting with a good one (scroll down to see all):
An extraction is invalid if the program chooses the wrong subject or relationship, as shown below:
An extraction can also be invalid if it lacks important surrounding context:
